data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Kayah access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kayah, Myanmar (Burma)
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Kayah, Myanmar (Burma) that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Kayah, Myanmar (Burma).
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 241,436 lost in Kayah that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Chaungtha people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Chaungtha people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Chaungtha people is yours.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Kayah to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Kayah. Through your servants plant 50 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kayah, Myanmar (Burma) has a population of 253,800.

We estimate Kayah has 12,364 people who might know Jesus, 8,352 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 233,084 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 20 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Kayah to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Kayah
location.people_groups_list: Hmong Njua, Bulang, Enn, Han Chinese, Hakka, Hindi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Hmong Njua (12,000), Bulang (15,000), Enn (500), Han Chinese, Hakka (22,000), Hindi (131,000)
